name: 2048 - Easy version
description:
It is a crazily popular game right now after the fever of flappy bird is over.

An easy game you just need to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

The score will be higher when you able to get 1024, 2048 or 4096.

Please try for your self. This is really additive game with may different combinations and possibilities.

Enjoy and remember to give us good rating.
